author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Driverless vehicles in the age of the novel coronavirus
description: The COVID-19 pandemic has led to different outcomes for different businesses. While some have stood to benefit (think Zoom, Facebook and bidet startup Tushy), others have been hit hard and laid off employees in order to survive. But there are some that fall s…
